name: Simple RAG Query
description: Agent uses RAG tool to search documents
message: What is Qdrant and how does it work? Search the documentation to answer.

name: GitHub Repository Search
description: Search for vector database repos on GitHub
message: Find me the top 5 most starred vector database repositories on GitHub

name: Code Search on GitHub
message: Show me examples of embedding generation code in Python on GitHub

name: Multi-Step RAG + GitHub
description: Agent combines RAG and GitHub search
message: First search our documentation about vector databases, then find similar open source projects on GitHub

name: Complex Research Task
description: Multi-tool research combining RAG and GitHub
message: Research how Qdrant compares to other vector databases. First check our docs, then search GitHub for alternatives, and finally search for code examples.

name: Parallel Tool Execution
description: Agent executes multiple tools in parallel
message: Search for 'machine learning' in both our documentation and GitHub repositories at the same time

name: Codebase Question
description: After ingesting a codebase, ask questions about it
message: What classes are defined in this codebase and what do they do?
prerequisites: Must ingest a codebase first using POST /agent/ingest-codebase
